alert.note: Alert for Clay (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 11:31PM CDT until June 14 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jefferson County in southern Oklahoma... Southwestern Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... Southeastern Cotton County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northeastern Clay County in northern Texas... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1131 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Temple, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Walters, Waurika, Temple, Ryan, Byers, Hastings, Addington, Sugden, Waurika Lake, and Taylor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
